message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product and would like to propose a price of $90.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
I'm glad you're still interested, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can offer it to you for $115.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $112.50, but that's as low as I can go.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.
I'm getting a bit frustrated, Bob. I've already met you at $112.50, and you're still at $110. I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll meet you at $112, but that's it.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.
